title: Emre Can - Soccer News, Rumors, & Updates | FOX Sports
snippet: Not training yet Can (groin) is out for Saturday's match against Mainz, according to manager Niko Kovac. "Emre is still not training with the team."

title: Emre Can Transfer from Borussia Dortmund to Fenerbahçe - TransferFeed
snippet: Fenerbahçe, Galatasaray, and ... deal as early as January. However, according to Bild, Can does not want to leave Dortmund and is not contemplating an early departure....

title: Besiktas, Fenerbahce, Galatasaray to race for Dortmund's Emre Can: Report - Türkiye Today
snippet: German international midfielder of Turkish origin Emre Can, currently playing for Borussia Dortmund in the Bundesliga, has reportedly drawn interest from Türkiye’s three leading football clubs: Besiktas, Fenerbahce and Galatasaray, according to local media reports.

title: Emre Can - News | Transfermarkt
snippet: Camavinga Dortmund's top priority - Same negotiation strategy as with Haaland? 18.02.2020 - 20:24 · Bundesliga · Borussia Dortmund make Emre Can deal permanent - Contract runs until 2024 ·
